snippet.title: Decoding the Genius Bar: A former employee shares insider secrets for getting help at the Apple Store
snippet.description: Whether you broke your iPhone or you need to learn how to edit video on your Mac, the Apple Store has services to assist. Here are tips to navigate it from a former employee.
